Definition at line 16 of file Curve.cpp.

virtual float jvgs::math::Curve::getLengthGuess (   )  const [protected, pure virtual]
 

Get a simple guess at the length. This is used in the approximation algorithm. It would be ideal if this result would be larger than the actual length, but too large or the calculation will be slower.

Returns:
A guess at the length.

Implemented in jvgs::math::CubicCurve, jvgs::math::EllipticalArc, and jvgs::math::QuadraticCurve.

Referenced by calculateLength().
